EYA Social Hackathon 2017

Blog Logo

on 05 Mar 2017



read

Over the weekend, me and my team attended the EYA Social Hackathon 2017. I’d like to post our result, cause I really like our idea and concept.

We love food and friends and therefore we need to create the ultimate tool to combine the best of both worlds. dumpster chef is an adventurous journey and your chance to make new friends and the world a better place by opposing the throw-away society.

Yesterday, we had to present our results at the SN Saal in Salzburg. There is also a video with our presentation.

Resources

We have put all our resources onto Github. So if you are interested in any part of the project, feel free to fork it.

There is also a summary at the Mediacube Portfolio.
